identity.name: E1
identity.style_reference: KEAP (Clean, Soft Shadows, Card-based, Automated Feel)

primary.usage: Primary Actions, Active States, Doctor Status

accent.usage: Success Messages, Assistant Status, Growth Stats

layout_strategy.cabinet_map_grid: grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 gap-4

card.base: bg-white rounded-[14px] border border-gray-100 shadow-[0_4px_20px_-4px_rgba(0,0,0,0.05)] hover:shadow-[0_8px_30px_-4px_rgba(0,145,185,0.1)] transition-all duration-300
card.title: text-lg font-bold text-gray-900

room_card.wrapper: relative overflow-hidden transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-1 group
room_card.status_indicator: absolute top-0 left-0 w-1 h-full transition-colors duration-300
room_card.content: p-5 pl-7 bg-white border border-gray-100 rounded-xl h-full flex flex-col justify-between

components.status_badge: inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium border

buttons.primary: bg-[#0091B9] hover:bg-[#007494] text-white font-semibold py-2.5 px-5 rounded-full shadow-[0_4px_14px_0_rgba(0,145,185,0.39)] transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.ghost: text-gray-600 hover:text-[#0091B9] hover:bg-gray-50 font-medium py-2 px-4 rounded-lg transition-colors

sidebar.container: hidden md:flex flex-col w-64 bg-white/95 backdrop-blur-xl border-r border-gray-100 h-screen sticky top-0 z-50
sidebar.link: flex items-center gap-3 px-4 py-3 text-sm font-medium text-gray-600 rounded-xl hover:bg-[#E6F4F8] hover:text-[#0091B9] transition-all my-1 mx-2

visual_assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons (Activity, Calendar, Users, LayoutGrid, Bell, Settings)

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: Do not overwrite App.css variables. Use them.
REFACTOR: The 'Cabinet Map' (Plan du Cabinet) must be a Grid of 'Room Cards', not a table.
FEATURE: Implement 'Actualit√©s' (News) as a vertical list in a side card.
VISUAL: Add subtle motion.div entrance animations to the dashboard cards.
LAYOUT: Use a SidebarLayout component to wrap the protected pages.
STATUS LOGIC: Map existing CSS variables (primary, accent, warning, gray) to the statuses: Doctor (Primary), Assistant (Accent), Waiting (Warning/Yellow), Free (Gray/Muted).
HEADER: Make it sticky with glassmorphism (backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80).
DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactable elements (e.g., room-card-box1, nav-link-dashboard).
